name: Bazooka BTA8100FCH BT Series 8" Amplified Tube Subwoofer

reviews.name: Bazooka BTA8100FCH BT Series 8" Amplified Tube Subwoofer
reviews.reviewText: i own a ranger so this fit very tightly behind the seat. but in the small cab it is great for songs with alot of bass it is very affordable and a few of my friends have this in their trucks. if u want some bass at a n affordable price this is for you. it comes with everything you need to install it. great for all types of music when tuned. does not have a huge amount of bass so it wont set off car alarms but in a small cab truck it has more than enough bass.
reviews.title: great sub for a small cab truck

reviews.name: Bazooka BTA8100FCH BT Series 8" Amplified Tube Subwoofer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and sounds great
reviews.title: Easy does it

reviews.name: Bazooka BTA8100FCH BT Series 8" Amplified Tube Subwoofer
reviews.reviewText:
The small size fully contained 8inch SUBWOOFER with its own amplifier is easy to install
either behind the seat on the floor, or in an out of the way tucked into a rear corner.

The only one of its small size I found. Powerfull enough to give full bass fill on your
adult audio. This will not shake the fillings of the driver's teeth in adjacent cars.
reviews.title: GOOD for full BASS FILL
